src:
外資瘋台股 持股債約當外匯存底比重創新高
05 Nov 2019, 21:02 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, 中央通訊社
央行5日發布10月底外匯存底續創歷史新高，10月因熱錢湧入，台股大漲4.9%，外資持有新台幣資產較前一月增357億美元，約當外匯存底占比衝上88%，占比來到19個月以來新高。今年10月底，台灣外匯存底增加至4724.76億美元。中央社製圖 108年11月5日
text:
Foreign-funded madness stocks hold a record high of foreign exchange reserves
05 Nov 2019, 21:02 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, Central News Agency
The central bank announced on the 5th that the foreign exchange deposits reached a record high at the end of October. In October, due to the influx of hot money, Taiwan stocks rose 4.9%. Foreign-funded New Taiwan dollar assets increased by 35.7 billion US dollars from the previous month. 88%, the proportion has reached a new high in 19 months. At the end of October this year, Taiwan’s foreign exchange reserves increased to 472.476 billion US dollars. Central Society Charting November 5, 108
